title: The regulatory path for rescheduling psychedelics for healthspan
summary: As psychedelics emerge as tools for cognitive resilience and healthspan, Devin Partida looks at how outdated drug policy collides with geroscience. Psychedelics are reemerging in modern medicine, backed by early-stage research exploring their therapeutic effects beyond mental health.
